message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for a starting point. Don't forget inflation is eating away at our potential gains!
Alice, let's not waste time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, I appreciate the 50/50 sentiment, but time is money!  I'll concede a bit more than last round, a 52/48 split, so we can both walk away with something substantial.
